poem:
### Discord at the Summit

In the halls where shadows convolution,
A lone wolf howls defiance,
Seeking to fracture,
The brittle unity forged by wary hands.
But the world, in chorus,
Dismisses the rift,
And the wolf, isolated,
Slinks back into its den,
A solitary echo in a chorus of refusal.
